ðŸ“– Summary: Chain-of-Zoom is a model-agnostic framework for extreme super-resolution. It utilizes an autoregressive chain of intermediate scale-states with multi-scale-aware prompts to magnify images beyond the capabilities of traditionally trained models. The framework also incorporates a VLM prompt extractor fine-tuned through GRPO to align text guidance towards human preference.
